thread.title: Preview: Canada vs Ghana international friendly match
thread.title_full: Preview: Canada vs Ghana international friendly match

title: Preview: Canada vs Ghana international friendly match
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 03:55 CET Preview: Canada vs Ghana international friendly match Ghana vrs Canada 
On Thanksgiving weekend in Canada, fans of the men's national team have plenty to be grateful for. 
The team ranks have been bolstered by a wave of reinforcements for their friendly against Ghana, including former fence-sitters Junior Hoilett and Fraser Aird, self-imposed absentee Lucas Cavallini and newcomer Wandrille LefÃ¨vre. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
